name: Wickfall
description:
This is my first Ludum Dare entry!

Your goal is to gather wax in the mines whilst the candle still burns bright, using it as a resource to build defences on the surface. 

If I had the time, I would have added more enemy and tower variety (along with music and sound effects). Maybe in the future though!

Controls
  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys, jump with the space bar/up arrow
  • Mine the yellow wax veins in range of your lantern by holding LMD
  • Build by pressing B and using the number buttons or scroll wheel to select a tower, place along the surface
